name: Auto Sitemap on Footer
author: Puneet Tiwari

sections.description:
Auto Sitemap on footer, made for easily link your sitemap.xml file link at the very bottom of the site, it will require no extra efford, just need to install and activate this plugin.

Readme Generator

This Readme file was generated using wp-readme, which generates readme files for WordPress Plugins.
sections.installation: Extract the zip file and just drop the contents in the wp-content/plugins/ directory of your WordPress installation and then activate the Plugin from Plugins page.

short_description: Plugin developed for inserting the sitemap link to footer without any hassle.
